artists.name: Adele
artists.info: Adele is a Grammy-winning artist known for her powerful voice and emotional ballads.

artists.name: Drake
artists.info: Drake is a globally recognized artist and rapper with numerous chart-topping hits.

artists.name: Taylor Swift
artists.info: Taylor Swift is a versatile artist known for her storytelling and genre-spanning music.

artists.name: Ed Sheeran
artists.info: Ed Sheeran is a prolific singer-songwriter with a unique style blending pop and acoustic elements.

artists.name: Billie Eilish
artists.info: Billie Eilish is a multi-award-winning artist known for her dark, moody sound and innovative music videos.

artists.name: BTS
artists.info: BTS is a globally acclaimed K-Pop group with a massive international fanbase.

artists.name: The Weeknd
artists.info: The Weeknd is known for his unique voice and hits blending R&B and pop elements.
